text: The women's 400 metres hurdles event at the 1982 Commonwealth Games was held on 5 and 7 October at the QE II Stadium in Brisbane, Australia. It was the first time that women competed in this event at the Commonwealth Games. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Debbie Flintoff '''' |Ruth Kyalisima '''' |Yvette Wray '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 4 in each heat (Q) and the next 1 fastest (q) qualify for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
